name: JumpBear
description:
Jump around, grind on rails, and run on walls to get around Bearguy's city to help his pal Dave with a power outage.

  • Collect Coins to purchase new abilities to help you get around the city.
  • Grind on rails to get around the town quick and look rad while doing it!
  • Jump, dash, grind, and wallrun to traverse around town and grab energy orbs that can be used to power up the gates around the city.
  • Help Dave solve his Saturday Breakfast Conundrum like any best pal would!
Playtime:

~ 20 minutes

Controls

Supports Keyboard/Mouse or a controller. You can view these controls on the pause menu in game.

  • Move - WASD or Left Thumbstick
  • Camera - Mouse or Right Thumbstick
  • Jump - Space or A/Cross
  • Interact/Talk - E or X/Square
  • Dash - Ctrl or B/Circle
  • Sprint - Left Shift or Right Trigger
  • Pause/Menu - P or Start
---

JumpBear is my first game created in an attempt to learn UE4 and the general pipeline of making a game. I hope you enjoy!
